name: Jam Fighter: Solo Edition
description:
CONTROLLER STRONGLY RECOMMENDED

PLAY WITH A FRIEND OR LOVED ONE, LOCALLY (OR USE TEAMVIEWER ETC.)

Street Fighter 2 if it was made in 10 days by one programmer/artist.

Made in 10 days for Retrograde Jam 2.

This was my first solo jam, but it wouldn't have been possible with some help with the sound & music:

SPECIAL THANKS TO:

Jordan Semrow, for doing the Warlock's voice.

www.JordanSemrowVO.com

@JordanSemrowVO on Twitter

Also special thanks to my girlfriend for help with the music and sound editing ^_^
